header.title: Topic Preview for Board3 Portal 2.0.X
header.description:
This add-on allows you to integrate Topic Preview with the Board3 Portal.
* All changes will be made to Board3 Portal files. Please back up your original files before modifying them. ** Topic Preview's "jQuery Topic Preview" theme will not work with Board3. Only the default native Topic Preview functionality will work with Board3.
header.author-notes: Requirements: You must already have installed "Board3 Portal 2.0.X" and "Topic Preview 2.0.2" on your forum.
